author: mukulg
msg: changing assertions failure error codes a bit (making them in line with recommendations from the spec).

we might also change assertions error codes for simpleType with variety atomic and list (i.e making them of flavor cvc-assertions-valid instead of the current cvc-assertion.3.13.4.1). i might work on this a bit later.

author: mukulg
msg: making few fixes to assertions evaluations as per suggestions from Sandy Gao in jira issue XERCESJ-1488.
a summary of changes in this commit are following,
1. moving assertion evaluations for attributes in startElement call instead of the earlier endElement. this helps us in setting PSVI results for attributes properly.
2. setting memberType PSVI result for elements and attributes for simpleType->union schema types.
3. improving assertion failure messages for simpleType->union cases, making this inline with errors messages to xs:enumeration (another multivalued facet) for example.
there are few miscellaneous refactoring, and javadoc/comment improvements.
i might attempt few other refactorings and improved comments later.
